About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

A former dancer, acrobat and massage-therapist became a Entry-Level Frontend Developer. I love all things digital, am open-minded, curious and empathic. I dont claim to know everything but I know how to find out everything and then learn it! If I am not coding and studying I enjoy being in nature with my two dogs Lucy and Wanja.

Web Development

Front End Development

The Frontend is where my heart goes. With a good understanding of HTML5 & CSS3 and Javascript I want to build stunning websites! Lots of them! I can build from scratch as well as using frameworks like ReactJS or VueJS.

Web Design

Wordpress | Webflow | Gimp | Adobe XD

I am teaching myself tools I havent learned at SPICED Academy to improve my skillset to become a Designer who can Code / a Developer who can Design!

With Dogs

Lucy & Wanja

My buddies who keep me happy and responsible. Two extraordinarily well-behaved sweet pups who would love to sleep under my desk while coding.
